entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries or periods of ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to periods of freezing rain and a few rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Freezing rain and a few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
